E7V.F.summary: Rexel S.A. distributes electrical products for residential, commercial, and industrial sectors. The company offers smart cameras, sensors, controllers, and monitoring software; light sources, lights, and control switches; climate control products, including heat pumps, air conditioning, and water heaters; fire alarms, surveillance equipment, access controls devices, and emergency lightings; and connection cables, switches, and routers, as well as enclosures, mounts, and racks. It also provides solar modules and inverters; connected lighting, intelligent home system, home control touch screen, and smart thermostat products; residential chargers, commercial stations, and charging cables for electric vehicles; electric motors, variable speed drives, programmable logic controllers, and computers and operator interface; and fastening systems, electrical power and control, and valves and instrumentation products. The company offers products and services in the fields of technical supply, automation, and energy management related to construction, renovation, maintenance and production. As of May 12, 2020, the company operated a network of approximately 1,900 branches in 26 countries. It principally operates France, Scandinavia, Benelux, the United Kingdom, Germany, the United States, Canada, China, and Australia. Rexel S.A. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Paris, France.

SAMS.PA.summary: Samse SA distributes building materials and tools in France. It sells insulation products; partitions, ceilings, and floors; tools; carpentry and lumber products; blades; cladding and paneling products; terraces and outdoor wood products; panels; parquet and flooring products; and covers and sealing products. The company also offers water supply, public works, and hardware products; carpentry products and closures; floor tiles; sanitary and plumbing products; painting, treatment, and drugstore products; heating and ventilation products; electricity and lighting products; and products for outdoor facilities. It serves customers through approximately 80 points of sales in Auvergne-RhÃ´ne-Alpes, Paca, and Gard. The company was founded in 1920 and is headquartered in Grenoble, France. Samse SA is a subsidiary of Dumont Investissement.

THEP.PA.summary: Thermador Groupe SA, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the distribution business in France and internationally. The company offers central heating and domestic hot water accessories, pumps for heating, plumbing equipment, taps, valves for building, ventilation equipment and accessories, industrial valves and fittings, cold water pumps, swimming pool equipment and accessories, air compressors, generators, and welding stations. It also provides accessories and connectors for central heating and domestic water, and plumbing fitments; pipework for the distribution of building fluids; components to original equipment manufacturers; and connectors and meters for construction industry and water supply. In addition, the company offers motorized valves and specialty products for industry; stainless steel connectors, flanges, valves, and accessories; pumps, tanks, accessories, and lifting stations; equipment and accessories for swimming pool construction and maintenance; bathroom and kitchen taps for DIY superstores and retail outlets; domestic pumps, plumbing fitments, and other taps for DIY superstores; and compressors, compressed air tools, welding stations, generators, battery chargers, and heating for DIY stores. Thermador Groupe SA offers its products to wholesalers in heating and sanitation, pumps, plumbing fittings, and industrialists. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Saint-Quentin-Fallavier, France.
